page.title: 12CHIPPERFLD ANIMALS & PLANTS
page.content: {FARMING }Height of land around 130m. Underlying rock and chalk is overlaid with clay and flints. Barley, wheat and rape are grown. Many hedges removed in last ten years. Mainly beef cattle kept. Heavy grazing by ponies in many fields has left ragwort to predominate. {FLORA AND FAUNA} TREES _ beech, cherry, sycamore, oak, ash, holly. FLOWERS _ bluebells, honeysuckle, blackberry, stitchwort. BIRDS _ green & spotted woodpecker, nuthatch, pigeon, ringdove, kestrel, blue, great and coletits, magpies. HEDGEROW BIRDS _ chaffinch, sparrow, and yellowhammer greatly reduced by loss of habitat. Skylarks also seem missing to a large extent this year. ANIMALS _ hedgehog, rabbits, badger, muntjak deer and grey squirrels.
